column1: [NBA] Tennessee freshman Keon Johnson declares for NBA Draft
Is Keon Johnson the next Nassir Little? Strengths and Weaknesses?
Keon Johnson just set an NBA Combine record with a 48 inch max vertical jump.
[Haynes] Lottery prospect Keon Johnson — freshman guard out of Tennessee — has received an invite to the green room for the 2021 NBA Draft, league sources tell @YahooSports

[Givony] NBA Draft Green Room Invites: Cade Cunningham Jalen Green Evan Mobley Jalen Suggs Jon Kuminga Scottie Barnes Davion Mitchell James Bouknight Keon Johnson Franz Wagner Josh Giddey Jalen Johnson Corey Kispert Moses Moody Kai Jones A. Sengun Cam Thomas Z. Williams Chris Duarte Isaiah Jackson
Keon Johnson sets a new combine record with a 48.0 inch vertical
[Video] Keon Johnson breaks NBA Combine Record with 48.0 Vertical Inch Leap
[The Athletic] Tennessee freshman Keon Johnson recorded a max vertical jump of 48 inches Thursday to break the NBA Draft Combine record in the drill.
[Murray] Tennessee freshman, Keon Johnson, just set the NBA Draft Combine all-time record with a max vertical jump of 48 inches. Breaking the previous record by 2.5”.
Clippers first rounder Keon Johnson tonight: 8 points on 3/14 from the field, 1/8 from the 3, and 1/1 from the line
The LA Clippers knowing they didn’t have many future picks took advantage tonight and finished the draft with Keon Johnson, Jason Preston & Brandon Boston Jr
[highlight] Keon Johnson who pick was traded to the clippers, Pre draft interview: “I’ve always modeled my game after Kawhi Leonard,defensively”
The Los Angeles Clippers acquire the 21st overall pick from the New York Knicks and select Keon Johnson. The Knicks will receive the 25th overall pick and a future second via Detroit.
2021 NBA Draft - #21 Pick: Keon Johnson (Tennessee)
Keon Johnson shows off his combine record breaking 48 inch vertical, nearly hitting his head on the rim during this goaltend:
[highlight] Clippers rookie Keon Johnson flies for the dunk
The Clippers now have 10 players 25 or younger: Terance Mann, Luke Kennard, Ivica Zubac, Amir Coffey, Justise Winslow, Harry Giles, Jay Scrubb, Keon Johnson,Jason Preston and Brandon Boston Jr.

[Esnaashari] LA Clippers announce that Nicolas Batum (personal reasons), Serge Ibaka (rehab), Keon Johnson (illness), Kawhi Leonard (rehab) and Jason Preston (right foot injury) are OUT for tomorrow's season opener against Golden State.
[Highlight] Keon Johnson with a monster jam

[Swanson] Brandon Boston Jr., Reggie Jackson, Keon Johnson, Luke Kennard, Terance Mann and Ivica Zubac will work with the LA Clippers Foundation and Planet Fitness to distribute food to "1,000 families" Saturday at The Forum.
